Page Title: app.py

Module Overview:

  Purpose: This module initializes a Flask application and defines a simple route that returns a "Hello, World!" message when accessed.

  Dependencies: 
  - Flask: The Flask framework for building web applications.

This file does not contain any classes.

  hello_world() -> str:

  - Returns: str - The "Hello, World!" message.
